name: Slender: Original
description:
Slender: Original is finally here! Powered with the same Unity 3D technology game engine as Parsec Production's original, you will be surrounded by the most realistic environment

Collect all 8 items and escape from Slender Man. Step foot from a fighter jet and find your way to a drug laboratory. You may even find a secret jeep vehicle along the way!

Featuring:
• 3 timezones (day, dusk, and night)
• find all 8 items hidden randomly at 11 locations
• Breakable flashlight (shake device to fix)
• Swaying grass and trees
• Detailed sky with sunlight glare
• Adaptive object shadowing
• Original horror music
• Responsive easy movement and viewing controls
• Explore one of the biggest landscape you will ever play
• High resolution retina support
• Optional lower graphics setting to support older devices
• Universal application (play on all your devices)

IMPORTANT: To enhance gaming experience, earphones are recommended in order to hear our specifically designed horror music and sounds. Speaker volume can be an alternative but with sub-optimal effect. Please note our music cannot be reproduced and is under copyright of Kakoon Productions
